.class public auto ansi sealed Action`15<- T1, - T2, - T3, - T4, - T5, - T6, - T7, - T8, - T9, - T10, - T11, - T12, - T13, - T14, - T15> extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Sub Action(Of In T1, In T2, In T3, In T4, In T5, In T6, In T7, In T8, In T9, In T10, In T11, In T12, In T13, In T14, In T15)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2, arg3 As T3, arg4 As T4, arg5 As T5, arg6 As T6, arg7 As T7, arg8 As T8, arg9 As T9, arg10 As T10, arg11 As T11, arg12 As T12, arg13 As T13, arg14 As T14, arg15 As T15)

generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7, typename T8, typename T9, typename T10, typename T11, typename T12, typename T13, typename T14, typename T15> public delegate void Action(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7, T8 arg8, T9 arg9, T10 arg10, T11 arg11, T12 arg12, T13 arg13, T14 arg14, T15 arg15);

summary.span: 封裝有 15 個參數的方法，並且不會傳回值。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has 15 parameters and does not return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用做為參數傳遞給方法，而不必明確宣告自訂委派的委派。You can use the delegate to pass a method as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封裝的方法必須對應到這個委派所定義的方法簽章。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 這表示封裝的方法必須有 15 個參數，所有傳遞給它的值，而且必須傳回值。This means that the encapsulated method must have 15 parameters that are all passed to it by value, and it must not return a value. (在 C# 中，此方法必須傳回`void`。(In C#, the method must return `void`. 在 Visual Basic 中，它必須由定義`Sub`...`End Sub`In Visual Basic, it must be defined by the `Sub`…`End Sub` 建構。construct. 它也可以傳回值，則會忽略這個值的方法。）通常，這種方法用來執行作業。It can also be a method that returns a value that is ignored.) Typically, such a method is used to perform an operation. > [!NOTE] > 若要參考具有 15 個參數並傳回值的方法，使用泛型改為委派。To reference a method that has 15 parameters and returns a value, use the generic delegate instead. 您也可以使用委派與匿名方法和 lambda 運算式。You can also use the delegate with anonymous methods and lambda expressions.
